argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringcbasbasOLD.r | |- C = ( RingCatOLD ` U ) |
| 2 |  | ringcbasbasOLD.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 3 |  | ringcbasbasOLD.u | |- ( ph -> U e. WUni ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_ringcbasOLD | |- ( ph -> B = ( U i^i Ring ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ph -> ( R e. B <-> R e. ( U i^i Ring ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elin | |- ( R e. ( U i^i Ring ) <-> ( R e. U /\ R e. Ring ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-base | |- Base = Slot 1 |
| 8 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( U e. WUni /\ R e. U ) -> U e. WUni ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( U e. WUni /\ R e. U ) -> R e. U ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_wunstr | |- ( ( U e. WUni /\ R e. U ) -> ( Base ` R ) e. U ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ex | |- ( U e. WUni -> ( R e. U -> ( Base ` R ) e. U ) ) |
| 12 | 3, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( R e. U -> ( Base ` R ) e. U ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_com12 | |- ( R e. U -> ( ph -> ( Base ` R ) e. U ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. U /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( ph -> ( Base ` R ) e. U ) ) |
| 15 | 6, 14 | #P_sylbi | |- ( R e. ( U i^i Ring ) -> ( ph -> ( Base ` R ) e. U ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_com12 | |- ( ph -> ( R e. ( U i^i Ring ) -> ( Base ` R ) e. U ) ) |
| 17 | 5, 16 | #P_sylbid | |- ( ph -> ( R e. B -> ( Base ` R ) e. U ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_imp | |- ( ( ph /\ R e. B ) -> ( Base ` R ) e. U ) |
